text:
An other issue. Been looking up for hours but nothing works :exploding_head:

I want to use 'context' but I can't get the value in my section itself. Is there anyone please who can help me?
Hi there! Would anyone know is it possible to embed a live excel file or google sheet onto a page? Or create a module that allows this?
I don't know if this is your issue or not, but I see context.title is misspelled in two spots
Yeah, I wrote the key in Dutch so I could see the difference :wink:
